name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: [SOUND]

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: This lecture is about using a time series

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: as context to potentially discover causal topics in text.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _In this lecture
column6: we're going to continue discussing Contextual Text Mining. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _In particular
column6: we're going to look at the time series as a context for _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _analyzing text
column6: to potentially discover causal topics. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _As usual
column6: it started with the motivation. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _In this case
column6: we hope to use text mining to understand a time series. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Here
column6: what you are seeing is Dow Jones Industrial Average stock price curves. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And you'll see a sudden drop here.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Right.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So one would be interested knowing what might have caused the stock

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: market to crash.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Well
column6: if you know the background
column7: and you might be able to figure it out if you _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _look at the time stamp
column6: or there are other data that can help us think about. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: But the question here is can we get some clues about this

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: from the companion news stream?

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And we have a lot of news data that generated during that period.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So if you do that we might actually discover the crash.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _After it happened
column6: at the time of the September 11 attack. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And that's the time when there is a sudden rise of the topic

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: about September 11 happened in news articles.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Here's another scenario where we want to analyze the Presidential Election.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And this is the time series that are from the Presidential Prediction Market.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _For example
column6: I write a trunk of market would have stocks for each candidate. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And if you believe one candidate that will win then you tend to buy the stock for

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _that candidate
column6: causing the price of that candidate to increase. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So
column6: that's a nice way to actual do survey of people's opinions about _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: these candidates.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now
column6: suppose you see something drop of price for one candidate. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And you might also want to know what might have caused the sudden drop.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Or in a social science study
column6: you might be interested in knowing what method _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _in this election
column6: what issues really matter to people. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now again in this case

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: we can look at the companion news stream and ask for the question.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Are there any clues in the news stream that might provide insight about this?

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So for example
column6: we might discover the mention of tax cut _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: has been increasing since that point.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So maybe
column6: that's related to the drop of the price. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So all these cases are special cases of a general problem of joint

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: analysis of text and a time series data to discover causal topics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: The input in this case is time series plus

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _text data that are produced in the same time period
column6: the companion text stream. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _And this is different from the standard topic models

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: where we have just to text collection.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _That's why we see time series here
column6: it serves as context. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now
column6: the output that we want to generate is the topics _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: whose coverage in the text stream has strong correlations with the time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _For example
column6: whenever the topic is managing the price tends to go down

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Now we call these topics Causal Topics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Of course
column6: they're not

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _We are never going to be able to verify whether they are causal
column6: or _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: there's a true causal relationship here.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: That's why we put causal in quotation marks.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: But at least they are correlating topics that might potentially

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: explain the cause and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: humans can certainly further analyze such topics to understand the issue better.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And the output would contain topics just like in topic modeling.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: But we hope that these topics are not just the regular topics with.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _These topics certainly don't have to explain the data of the best in text
column6: but _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: rather they have to explain the data in the text.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Meaning that they have to reprehend the meaningful topics in text.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Cement but also more importantly

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: they should be correlated with external hand series that's given as a context.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So to understand how we solve this problem
column6: let's first adjust to _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _solve the problem with reactive topic model
column6: for example PRSA. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And we can apply this to text stream and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: with some extension like a CPRSA or Contextual PRSA.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Then we can discover these topics in the correlation and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: also discover their coverage over time.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So
column6: one simple solution is

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: this set that have the strongest correlation with the external time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: But this approach is not going to be very good.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Why? Because

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: awareness pictured to the topics is that they will discover by PRSA or LDA.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And that means the choice of topics will be very limited.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And we know these models try to maximize the likelihood of the text data.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So those topics tend to be the major topics that explain the text data well.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: aAnd they are not necessarily correlated with time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Even if we get the best one
column6: the most correlated topics might still not be so _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: interesting from causal perspective.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So here in this work site here
column6: a better approach was proposed. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And this approach is called Iterative Causal Topic Modeling.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _The idea is to do an iterative adjustment of topic

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: discovered by topic models using time series to induce a product.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So here's an illustration on how this work
column6: how this works. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Take the text stream as input and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: then apply regular topic modeling to generate a number of topics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Let's say four topics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Shown here.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And then we're going to use external time series to assess

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: which topic is more causally related or correlated with the external time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So we have something that rank them.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And we might think that topic one and topic four are more correlated and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: topic two and topic three are not.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Now we could have stopped here and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: that would be just like what the simple approached that I talked about earlier

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: then we can get to these topics and call them causal topics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: But as I also explained that these topics are unlikely very good

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: because they are general topics that explain the whole text connection.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: They are not necessary.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: The best topics are correlated with our time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So what we can do in this approach is to first zoom into word level and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: we can look into each word and the top ranked word listed for each topic.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Let's say we take Topic 1 as the target examined.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: We know Topic 1 is correlated with the time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Or is at least the best that we could get from this set of topics so far.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _And we're going to look at the words in this topic
column6: the top words. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _And if the topic is correlated with the Time Series

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: there must be some words that are highly correlated with the Time Series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So here
column6: for example
column7: we might discover W1 and W3 are positively _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _correlated with Time Series
column6: but W2 and W4 are negatively correlated. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So
column6: as a topic
column7: and it's not good to mix these words with different correlations. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So we can then for the separate of these words.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: We are going to get all the red words that indicate positive correlations.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: W1 and W3. And

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: we're going to also get another sub topic.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: If you want.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _That represents a negatively correlated words
column6: W2 and W4. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now
column6: these subtopics

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _analysis
column6: are topics that are still quite related to the original topic

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _But they are already deviating

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: because of the use of time series information for bias selection of words.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So then in some sense
column6: well we should expect so

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: more correlated with the time series than the original Topic 1.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Because the Topic 1 has mixed words
column6: here we separate them. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So each of these two subtopics

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: can be expected to be better coherent in this time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _However
column6: they may not be so coherent as it mention. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So the idea here is to go back to topic model by using these

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: each as a prior to further guide the topic modeling.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And that's to say we ask our topic models now discover topics that

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: are very similar to each of these two subtopics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And this will cause a bias toward more correlate to the topics was a time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Of course then we can apply topic models to get another generation of topics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And that can be further ran to the base of the time series to set after the highly

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: correlated topics.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And then we can further analyze the components at work in the topic and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: then try to analyze.word level correlation.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And then get the even more correlated subtopics that can be

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: further fed into the process as prior to drive the topic of model discovery.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So this whole process is just a heuristic way of optimizing causality and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _coherence
column6: and that's our ultimate goal. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Right?

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So here you see the pure topic models will be very good at

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _maximizing topic coherence
column6: the topics will be all meaningful. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _If we only use causality test
column6: or correlation measure

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _then we might get a set words that are strongly correlate with time series

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: but they may not necessarily mean anything.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: It might not be cementric connected.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So
column6: that would be at the other extreme

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now
column6: the ideal is to get the causal topic that's scored high

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: both in topic coherence and also causal relation.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _In this approach

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: it can be regarded as an alternate way to maximize both sine engines.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So when we apply the topic models we're maximizing the coherence.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: But when we decompose the topic model words into sets

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: of words that are very strong correlated with the time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: We select the most strongly correlated words with the time series.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: We are pushing the model back to the causal

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: dimension to make it better in causal scoring.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _And then
column6: when we apply the selected words as a prior _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _to guide a topic modeling
column6: we again go back to optimize the coherence. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Because topic models
column6: we ensure the next generation of topics to be coherent and _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: we can iterate when they're optimized in this way as shown on this picture.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So the only I think a component that you haven't seen such a framework is how

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: to measure the causality.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Because the rest is just talking more on.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So let's have a little bit of discussion of that.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So here we show that.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And let's say we have a topic about government response here.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And then we just talking more of we can get coverage of the topic over time.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So
column6: we have a time series

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now
column6: we also have
column7: are give a time series that represents external information. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _It's a non text time series
column6: Y sub t. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: It's the stock prices.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Now the the question here is does Xt cause Yt?

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Well in other words
column6: we want to match the causality relation between the two. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Or maybe just measure the correlation of the two.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: There are many measures that we can use in this framework.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _For example
column6: pairs in correlation is a common use measure. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And we got to consider time lag here so

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: that we can try to capture causal relation.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Using somewhat past data and using the data in the past

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: to try to correlate with the data on

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _points of y that represents the future
column6: for example. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _And by introducing such lag
column6: we can hopefully capture some causal relation by _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: even using correlation measures like person correlation.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _But a common use
column6: the measure for causality here is Granger Causality Test. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And the idea of this test is actually quite simple.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Basically you're going to have all the regressive model to

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: use the history information of Y to predict itself.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And this is the best we could without any other information.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So we're going to build such a model.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And then we're going to add some history information of X into such model.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: To see if we can improve the prediction of Y.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: If we can do that with a statistically significant difference.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Then we just say X has some causal inference on Y

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: or otherwise it wouldn't have causal improvement of prediction of Y.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _If
column6: on the other hand

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: that would mean X does not really have a cause or relation why.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: So that's the basic idea.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now
column6: we don't have time to explain this in detail so you could read

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: you would read at this cited reference here to know more about this measure.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: It's a very convenient used measure.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Has many applications.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt

text: _So in the end
column6: let's summarize the discussion of Text-based Prediction. _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now
column6: Text-based prediction is generally very useful for _

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: big data applications that involve text.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Because they can help us inform new knowledge about the world.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And the knowledge can go beyond what's discussed in the text.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: As a result can also support optimizing of our decision making.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And this has a wider spread application.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: Text data is often combined with non-text data for prediction.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _because
column6: for this purpose

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _we generally would like to combine non-text data and text data together

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: as much cruel as possible for prediction.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: And so as a result during the analysis of text and

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: non-text is very necessary and it's also very useful.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _Now when we analyze text data together with non-text data

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: we can see they can help each other.

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: _So non-text data
column6: provide a context for mining text data

name: 5 - 10 - 4.10 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Casual Topics with Time Series Supervision (00-19-37).srt
text: we discussed a number of techniques for contextual text mining.

column6: a text data can also help interpret _
